title: Magic Link Authentication Success
description: Verify that a user with a valid @sonymusic.com email address or whitelisted email can successfully log in using the magic link authentication.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter a valid @sonymusic.com or whitelisted email address.
Request magic link and open the received link.
Verify the user is authenticated and redirected to the HUD interface.

title: Magic Link Authentication Domain Restriction Enforcement
description: Verify that login is rejected for emails outside the @sonymusic.com domain and not in the whitelist.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter an email address not ending with @sonymusic.com and not whitelisted.
Request magic link.
Verify an error message indicating invalid domain restriction is displayed and no magic link is sent.

title: Login Form Password Option and Validation
description: Verify the login form allows password entry, correctly validates credentials, and handles errors.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Select password login option.
Enter valid email and correct password.
Submit login form.
Verify successful login and HUD interface is shown.
Repeat login with correct email and incorrect password.
Verify appropriate error message for invalid credentials is displayed.

title: Real-time Transcription Latency and Accuracy
description: Verify that real-time transcription updates have latency under 2 seconds with accuracy above 85% for key classification.

steps.description: Join a live meeting session and start speaking.
Verify transcribed text displays within 2 seconds after speech.
Verify transcription accuracy is above 85% compared to reference transcript.

title: AI Generated Meeting Summaries Quality
description: Verify AI generated summaries and insights meet user satisfaction rating above 4 out of 5 in usability testing.

steps.description: Conduct multiple sample meetings with AI-generated summaries.
Collect user feedback and verify average satisfaction rating is over 4 out of 5.

title: Speaker Identification and Sentiment Analysis Accuracy
description: Verify speaker diarization correctly identifies different speakers and sentiment/emotion detection reflects correct contextual cues.

steps.description: Simulate a meeting with multiple distinct speakers.
Confirm speaker labels in transcription correspond to actual speakers.
Verify sentiment and emotion analysis matches expected tone and mood from speech samples.

title: Audio Waveform and Digital Rain Visualization
description: Verify that audio waveform and digital rain visualization reflect live audio SPL levels accurately from microphone and meeting input.

steps.description: Provide varying audio input levels from microphone and meeting streams.
Visually verify waveform and digital rain effects respond dynamically to audio SPL changes.
Confirm logged data corresponds to visualized audio intensity.

title: HUD Layout Responsiveness and Accessibility
description: Verify HUD interface layout with circular navigation and glassmorphism effects adapts well across different screen sizes and supports accessibility features.

steps.description: Access the HUD on multiple devices and screen resolutions.
Verify layout elements adjust appropriately without overlaps or truncations.
Test color contrast and reduced motion settings.
Confirm UI meets WCAG guidelines including keyboard navigation support.

title: System Health Monitor Accuracy and Error Reporting
description: Verify system health monitor reports accurate status and keeps error rates below 5%.

steps.description: Simulate normal and error system states.
Verify system health monitor displays correct status messages.
Check error reporting accuracy and that error rate remains below 5% over extended runtime.

title: User Settings Panel Functionality
description: Verify that users can access, modify, and save settings in the Settings Panel with reflection in system behavior.

steps.description: Open the settings panel.
Change configurable settings such as audio input source and privacy preferences.
Save changes and close panel.
Verify changes take effect immediately or after restart as specified.

title: Privacy and Data Retention Compliance
description: Verify privacy policies are enforced by data minimization, encryption, anonymization, and configurable retention periods.

steps.description: Configure data retention period to shortest option.
Verify export and storage comply with configured retention and anonymization policies.
Inspect stored data to confirm encryption and data minimization.
Verify no unauthorized sensitive user data is retained beyond retention period.

title: AI/ML Backend Performance Under Load
description: Verify AI/ML backend modules perform efficiently during peak load with memory usage under 2GB and without UI blocking.

steps.description: Simulate multiple concurrent live meeting sessions with audio streams.
Monitor memory usage and confirm it remains under 2GB.
Verify UI remains responsive with no blocking or freezes.

title: Content Aggregator and External Service Integration
description: Verify AOMA Content Aggregator and MCP Client Wrapper correctly fetch and integrate external content and service data.

steps.description: Initiate content fetch from AOMA Mesh MCP server.
Verify fetched content is correctly displayed and integrated in AI insights dashboard.
Trigger MCP Client API calls.
Confirm correct processing and display of external data from MCP services.

title: Lambda Health Verifier Service Validation
description: Verify the Lambda Health Verifier service accurately reports AWS Lambda function health and error states.

steps.description: Run health checks on all AWS Lambda functions used in the system.
Verify the health verifier reports correct healthy or error states for each Lambda function.

title: Meeting Data Export and Vector Storage
description: Verify meeting data including transcription, insights, and vector embeddings are exported and stored correctly for retrieval.

steps.description: Conduct a full meeting session.
Trigger meeting data export at meeting end.
Verify data is saved with correct vector representations and metadata.
Retrieve stored data and verify integrity and completeness.
